content: I'm thinking it might make sense to just rotate through -- say, @pnkfelix can do next week and then @rylev and then myself in 3 weeks -- not sure how it'll work on schedules and such and we can always swap, but maybe a good start?
@rylev just a brief reminder that you're up for triage this week. I'm not sure if there's a nice way to get the rotation somehow easily accessible...
I have it in my calendar for tomorrow. I've been doing it usually on Tuesdays (and I think that's when most have been doing it). Is that fine?
Great - I should actually just setup a tri-weekly event for myself
